name: Convertible Oversized Knitted Infinity Scarf/Black and Cream
description:
This oversized knitted infinity scarf is perfect for the winter. This scarf can be worn three ways: as a loose scarf, a snug and comfy cowl and a criss cross vest. 

Perfect for yourself or as a gift.

Care:

Machine wash warn in the gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. 

Production:

The production time for all of my products are 7-10 business days from the date of purchase.

SHIPPING: 

All of my items are shipped 7-10 business days after purchase

name: The TriColor Knitted Headband
description:
The TriColor knitted headband is perfect for any occasion. This headband is made with vegan-friendly acrylic yarn.

If you want to stand out, this is the headband for you. 

This TriColor is made with blue, black and red yarn.

Care:

Hand wash and lay flat to dry.

Production:

The production time for all of my products are 7-10 business days from the date of purchase.

name: Lavender and Black Knitted Cowl/Neck Warmer
description:
This knitted cowl/neck warmer is ideal for those cold winter days and nights. Designed with a black strip, this neck warmer is unique, as well as stylish. 

You can wear this neck warmer with your favorite sweater, blouse or coat. 

This neck warmer is made with the softest vegan-friendly yarn. 

Keep in mind the black strip is part of the overall design.

Measures at 15" x 10.5"

CARE:

Machine wash warm on the gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not over dry. 

PRODUCTION:

The production time for all of my products are 7-10 business days from the date of purchase.

name: "The Luxe" Chunky Knitted Headband in Wine
description:
The Luxe knitted headband is comfy, plush and is the perfect accessory for a cold winter night. 

This is made with chunky yarn and it is extremely warm. This headband is made with a vegan-friendly acrylic yarn.

This item is made to order.

CARE:

Hand wash and lay flat to dry. 

Production:

Every piece is handmade by me and takes approximately 7-10 business days after the date of purchase.

name: "Starry Night" Sparkle Knitted Turban-Style Headband
description:
The Starry Night Handmade Knitted Headband is one of my favorites. It is glamorous and fun. The sparkle feature makes the headband unique. 

This is wide enough on the sides to look like a stylish turban that is very trendy. 

This headband is made with an acrylic wool blend yarn that is sure to keep your head and ears warm.

This is a made to order item.

This item should be hand washed and laid flat to dry. 

PRODUCTION:

Every item is handmade by me and takes approximately 7-10 business days from the date of purchase.
